item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID$1) coding type
ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream attenuation
item_prototype.description: "Measured difference in the total power transmitted by the peer ATU and the total power received by this ATU. This value is determined in accordance with T1.413[10]."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream number of Errored Seconds
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Errored Seconds since agent reset. The errored second parameter is a count of one-second intervals containing one or more crc anomalies, or one or more los or sef defects."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream number of Loss of Framing
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Framing failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream number of Loss of Power failures
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Power failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream number of Loss of Signal failures
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Signal failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream SNR
item_prototype.description: "Noise Margin as seen by this ATU with respect to its received signal. This value is determined in accordance with T1.413 [10]."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) downstream speed
item_prototype.description: "Indicates the maximum currently attainable data rate by the ATU. This value will be equal or greater than the current line rate."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) physical entity type
item_prototype.description: "Defines the type of ADSL physical line entity that exists, by defining whether and how the line is channelized. If the line is channelized, the value will be other than noChannel(1). This object defines which channel type(s) are supported."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream attenuation
item_prototype.description: "Measured difference in the total power transmitted by the peer ATU and the total power received by this ATU. This value is determined in accordance with T1.413[10]."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream number of Errored Seconds
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Errored Seconds since agent reset. The errored second parameter is a count of one-second intervals containing one or more crc anomalies, or one or more los or sef defects."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream number of Loss of Framing
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Framing failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream number of Loss of Power failures
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Power failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream number of Loss of Signal failures
item_prototype.description: "Count of the number of Loss of Signal failures since agent reset."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream SNR
item_prototype.description: "Noise Margin as seen by this ATU with respect to its received signal. This value is determined in accordance with T1.413 [10]."

item_prototype.name: ADSL line (ID{#SNMPINDEX}) upstream speed
item_prototype.description: "Indicates the maximum currently attainable data rate by the ATU. This value will be equal or greater than the current line rate."

trigger_prototype.name: ADSL line signal to noise ratio has changed

item_prototype.name: SDSL line (ID$1) speed
SDSL line (ID{#ADVSNMPINDEX2}) attenuation on wire pair 1
item_prototype.description: "The current loop attenuation for this endpoint as reported in a Network or Customer Side Performance Status message."

item_prototype.description: "The current loop attenuation for this endpoint as reported in a Network or Customer Side Performance Status message."

item_prototype.description: "The current loop attenuation for this endpoint as reported in a Network or Customer Side Performance Status message."

item_prototype.description: "Count of CRC anomalies on this endpoint since the xU was last restarted."

item_prototype.description: "Count of CRC anomalies on this endpoint since the xU was last restarted."

item_prototype.name: SDSL line (ID{#ADVSNMPINDEX2}) Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) on wire pair 1
item_prototype.description: "Count of Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) Seconds on this endpoint since the xU was last restarted."

item_prototype.name: SDSL line (ID{#ADVSNMPINDEX2}) Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) on wire pair 2
item_prototype.description: "Count of Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) Seconds on this endpoint since the xU was last restarted."

item_prototype.description: "Count of Loss of Sync Word (LOSW) Seconds on this endpoint since the xU was last restarted."

item_prototype.name: SDSL line (ID{#ADVSNMPINDEX2}) SNR margin on wire pair 1
item_prototype.description: "The current SNR margin for this endpoint as reported in a Status Response/SNR message."

item_prototype.description: "The current SNR margin for this endpoint as reported in a Status Response/SNR message."
